rows.label: tev021501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Tracey about her work as a Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Tracey if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Tracey about the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Tracey about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Tracey about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0001
rows.name:
We investigate crimes and resolve conflicts within the
city walls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0002
rows.name:
The obvious analogy is that we're NLA's police force.
It's a very different job from the other divisions,
whose duties have them traveling throughout Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0003
rows.name:
So unlike those divisions, our members are more likely
to have been police officers or detectives than military.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0004
rows.name:
In fact, I was recruited into the division because of my
experience as a police detective in the old Los Angeles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0005
rows.name:
I know what you're thinking—she must be a lot more
capable than she looks. And you're right! With my
detective's instincts, there's no crime I can't solve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0006
rows.name:
So you'd best keep your own nose clean, [ST:gender p1=pal p2=missy ].
If you try anything suspicious, I'll figure it out in
no time flat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0009
rows.name:
The industrial district is home to the integrated
production plant, a vital piece of New LA infrastructure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0010
rows.name:
I spoke to a researcher there who was bemoaning
the insufficient amount of Miran flora samples
they've received.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0011
rows.name:
As it's my duty to patrol the city, there was nothing
I could do to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0012
rows.name:
But if you have spare time on your hands,
maybe you could assist with sample collecting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0021
rows.name:
We've had complaints coming in from the residential
district—they claim it's frightening to have a ship like
that floating above the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0022
rows.name:
That was a decision handed down by HQ,
so there's nothing we can do about it.
But I can appreciate why they'd be concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0023
rows.name:
There's also been talk recently of having a Ma-non
join the Mediators.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0024
rows.name:
What does this mean for the future of New LA?
I hope things don't get too weird around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Between the Ma-non and Nopon, it's quite the
menagerie of xenos we have living with us now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0028
rows.name:
Unfortunately, none of them seem to have much
understanding of Earth law.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0029
rows.name:
Does the prospect of xenoforms bringing their own
rules and committing criminal acts disturb you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well, worry not! Mediator Tracey and her detective's
instincts are on the beat. None of these scofflaws
will be getting away with anything under my watch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0031
rows.name: I will protect New LA. I'm the only woman for the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0039
rows.name:
The attack has my detective's instincts buzzing.
Could there have been a collaboration with local
xenoforms behind the scenes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Think about it—how could the enemy have known the
exact location of the machine they wanted to steal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0041
rows.name:
Even within BLADE, only a limited number of people
had access to that information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0042
rows.name:
So let's suppose, for example, that the Ma-non who
were "helping" us research the machine passed that
bit of information to the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0043
rows.name:
Does that not sound like a possible scenario?
Or even...a plausible one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0044
rows.name:
Officially, our friendship treaty with the Ma-non prevents
me from acting on these suspicions. But what's to stop
me from pursuing an investigation off the books...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Tracey about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0045
rows.name: At long last, a legitimate threat has come to our city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0046
rows.name:
Look at those helmets! Those strange staff...thingies!
If we were back on Earth, any cop worth his badge
would have them under arrest in a country minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0047
rows.name:
Nevertheless, Director General Chausson has introduced
them as our newest friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0048
rows.name:
But as a part of the thin blue line that separates
New LA from chaos, I do not acknowledge these
"Zaruboggan" as friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0049
rows.name:
I know that they're up to something nefarious...
And I intend to prove it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Tracey for her thoughts on
friendship treaties with xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Tracey about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0050
rows.name:
After the destruction of Earth, not everyone had the
most positive impression of alien races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0051
rows.name:
So when they first came to the city, many in New LA
were understandably apprehensive about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0052
rows.name:
But after they worked hand in hand with us to defeat
the Ganglion, things changed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0053
rows.name:
Now it seems that virtually everyone in New LA accepts
them as true friends of humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0054
rows.name:
And thanks to the help of that bighearted Shiraton,
I was able to clear up my own misunderstanding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0055
rows.name:
Now that I've had a chance to open a proper dialogue,
I'm proud of our choice to forge pacts of friendship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0058
rows.name:
Though I suspect there are some in New LA who
remain prejudiced towards our Zaruboggan friends,
I assure you that I will not tolerate such behavior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0059
rows.name:
Sure, they may walk around the city with strange
helmets and those little staff dealies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0060
rows.name:
But to discriminate like that based on appearances is
shamefully small-minded![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0061
rows.name: ...Hmm? You're saying I used to be that way myself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021501_MSG0062
rows.name:
Can you puh-LEASE put the past behind you already?
You won't be able to move forward in life if you're
constantly looking over your shoulder![ST:wait ]
